msg: Backport trunk fix;  Fix TestHCM.  Disabled the force OOME test -- we create a new Connection per new Configuration so yeah, we OOME;

author: mfreedman
msg: PORTLETBRIDGE-99:  Fixes (hopefully) the last issue related to serializing REQUEST_SCOPE_LISTENER

author: lhazlewood
msg: SHIRO-288 - removed the call to WebUtils.normalize - the value specified is done by a developer configuring Shiro, not an application end user - if the url the dev specifies is invalid, startup will fail fast showing what went wrong - no need to 'sanitize' developer configuration input in this case.  Added test cases for verification.
